calculator.title: Import Cost Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Estimate your total landed cost for importing a car to Korea

form.ftaPartner: FTA partner - may qualify for reduced duty
form.roroDesc: Cheaper option, car driven onto ship (exposed to elements)
form.containerDesc: Safer option, car enclosed in container (more expensive)

results.title: Cost Breakdown
results.fillDetails: Fill in the vehicle details and click "Calculate Total Cost" to see the estimated import costs.

calculator.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer: Estimates are approximate. Actual costs may vary based on specific circumstances, current exchange rates, vehicle condition, and changing regulations. Always consult with a licensed customs broker for accurate quotes.
